title: PM, Shahzain Bugti discuss measures for Baluchistan development
content:
ISLAMABAD, June 29 (APP): Member of the National Assembly (MNA) Nawabzada Shahzain Bugti called on Prime Minister Imran Khan here on Tuesday.
Minister for Planning Asad Umar and Minister for Defence Pevez Khattak were also present in the meeting.
During the meeting, the ongoing development projects under the Prime Minister’s vision of special focus on Baluchistan, the present government’s historic Baluchistan package, and the measures regarding the socioeconomic progress of the people of Baluchistan were discussed.
